items.sentence: I doubt that Tom is the only one that knows Mary's phone number.
If you look around, you'll see many people doing the same thing.
There's no way to know for sure if Tom was the one who did this.
Tom did a lot of things that he wouldn't normally do to survive.
He was caught cheating on the exam and got called on the carpet.
We won't be able to survive too much longer unless help arrives.
A rustling sound came from upstairs where nobody should've been.
I had lived in Sendai for ten years before I visited Matsushima.
Tom's parents forced him to take a class he didn't want to take.
After working all day, it felt good to just sit in the hot bath.
